Class ReactorDepthComparator

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.ordering.ReactorDepthComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparator<File>
public class ReactorDepthComparator extends Object implements Comparator<File>
Compares project paths relative to the base directory based on their depth in a reactor.

The comparator uses the reactor Model instances to determine the number of parent levels for each project and orders shallower projects before deeper ones. If two projects have the same depth the result falls back to comparing their GAV strings.

Since:
15-Sep-2010 14:54:42
Author:
Stephen Connolly

    • compare

      public int compare(File o1, File o2)
      Compare two project base directories by their reactor depth, then by their GAV.
      Specified by:
      compare in interface Comparator<File>
      Parameters:
      o1 - the first project base directory to compare
      o2 - the second project base directory to compare
      Returns:
      negative if o1 is ordered before o2, positive if after, zero if equal
